title: Part A
stimulusHtml: 1 point is earned for correctly sketching the graph where min is y > 0, concave up, and h(±6) < 40
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for correctly sketching the graph where min is y > 0, concave up, and h(±6) < 40

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for correctly sketching the graph where min is y > 0, concave up, and h(±6) < 40

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer h″(x)

h′(x) = 2x − sin x; h″(x) = 2 − cos x

1 point is earned for the correct answer h″(x) > 0 for all x OR h″(x) never changes sign

1 point is earned for the correct answer graph is concave up for all x OR no inflection points

2 − cos x > 0 for all x, so graph must be concave up everywhere
